description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Sea Shamblers:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Sea Shambler}s, they take 12% less damage for each enemy that is afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Sea Shambler
